<a id="AudioEffectRecord"></a>

# AudioEffectRecord

**Inherits:** [AudioEffect](AudioEffect.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Audio effect used for recording the sound from an audio bus.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Allows the user to record the sound from an audio bus into an [AudioStreamWAV](AudioStreamWAV.md). When used on the "Master" audio bus, this includes all audio output by Redot.

Unlike [AudioEffectCapture](AudioEffectCapture.md), this effect encodes the recording with the given format (8-bit, 16-bit, or compressed) instead of giving access to the raw audio samples.

Can be used (with an [AudioStreamMicrophone](AudioStreamMicrophone.md)) to record from a microphone.

\ **Note:** [ProjectSettings.audio/driver/enable_input](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_audio/driver/enable_input) must be ``true`` for audio input to work. See also that setting's description for caveats related to permissions and operating system privacy settings.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Recording with microphone](../tutorials/audio/recording_with_microphone.md)

- [Audio Microphone Record Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2760)

<a id="AudioEffectRecord_method_set_recording_active"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_recording_active**\ (\ record\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectRecord_method_set_recording_active)

If ``true``, the sound will be recorded. Note that restarting the recording will remove the previously recorded sample.
